Package main.java.model

Class PlayerPowerup

java.lang.Object
main.java.model.Powerup
main.java.model.PlayerPowerup
public class PlayerPowerup
extends Powerup
PlayerPowerup class is Child Class of the Powerup class. Responsible for all the implementations regarding the Player Powerup.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PlayerPowerup()
    PlayerPowerup constructor will create and set a position for the player powerup.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
    getBorderColor is a Getter Method will return the border variable.
    java.awt.Image getImage()
    getImage method will return image type variable.
    java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
    getInnerColor is a Getter Method will return the inner variable.
    java.awt.Shape getMultiFace()
    getMultiFace is a Getter Method will return the paddleFace variable.
    boolean getPlayerFace()
    getPlayerFace is a Getter Method to return the showPlayerFace variable.
    java.awt.geom.Point2D getPosition()
    getPosition returns the center of the powerup's position.
    boolean impact​(Ball b)
    impact method will detect if the ball has impacted the player powerup.
    java.awt.Shape makePowerup​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center)
    makePowerup will return a rectangle shape for the player powerup.
    void resetFace​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point)
    resetFace overrides parent class's (Powerup) resetFace().

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerPowerup

      public PlayerPowerup()
      PlayerPowerup constructor will create and set a position for the player powerup. It will also read an image for the player powerup's in game visual.

  • Method Details

    • getPosition

      public java.awt.geom.Point2D getPosition()
      getPosition returns the center of the powerup's position.
      Overrides:
      getPosition in class Powerup
      Returns:
      center of the powerup's position.

    • makePowerup

      public java.awt.Shape makePowerup​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center)
      makePowerup will return a rectangle shape for the player powerup.
      Parameters:
      center - Point.
      Returns:
      New rectangle shape with the value of x,y,25,25.

    • getMultiFace

      public java.awt.Shape getMultiFace()
      getMultiFace is a Getter Method will return the paddleFace variable.
      Returns:
      returns fireFace variable.

    • getBorderColor

      public java.awt.Color getBorderColor()
      getBorderColor is a Getter Method will return the border variable.
      Returns:
      returns border variable.

    • getInnerColor

      public java.awt.Color getInnerColor()
      getInnerColor is a Getter Method will return the inner variable.
      Returns:
      returns inner variable.

    • impact

      public boolean impact​(Ball b)
      impact method will detect if the ball has impacted the player powerup. If True then returns true, else return false.
      Parameters:
      b - ball object.
      Returns:
      boolean value to see if ball has impacted player powerup.

    • resetFace

      public void resetFace​(java.awt.geom.Point2D point)
      resetFace overrides parent class's (Powerup) resetFace(). This method will set the paddleFace variable into a rectangle shape by calling the makePowerup() method.

    • getPlayerFace

      public boolean getPlayerFace()
      getPlayerFace is a Getter Method to return the showPlayerFace variable.
      Returns:
      returns showPlayerFace boolean value.

    • getImage

      public java.awt.Image getImage()
      getImage method will return image type variable.
      Returns:
      returns image type value;
